text: (Kayamatacya) divasi tumhi pahala ki imana rakhanarya purusance ani striyance teja (nura) tyancya pudhe pudhe ani tyancya ujavikade dhavata asela. Aja tumhala tya jannatinca subha samacara ahe, jyancya khali (thanda panyace) pravaha vahata aheta, jyata te nehami rahatila, hica mothi saphalata ahe
